Also, someone once called me the science side of tumblr and that was pretty cool.

tags: poor peter doing money streching stuff always makes for more interesting visuals tbh
summary: If Peter Parker is so poor that he has just a few suits that he has to be constantly mending, does that mean he has a patchwork...
body:
If Peter Parker is so poor that he has just a few suits that he has to be constantly mending, does that mean he has a patchwork suit(s)?

Does he have a suit that’s just mismatched patches? Does he get fancy with his patches, like sashiko embroidery techniques in the shape of a web or spider for funsies? Does he have a suit that’s Frankensteined from previously wretched suits so all of the web designs are either a hot mess or looks sick as hell? Does he have a suit with scrap patches that Aunt May let him use, like some scrap fabric with novelty print designs he has to put on his knees or his backside?

This feels like a missed opportunity for some fun comic designs.

reblog.comment:

Does he have a suit that’s Frankensteined from previously wretched suits so all of the web designs are either a hot mess or looks sick as hell? Does he have a suit with scrap patches that Aunt May let him use, like some scrap fabric with novelty print designs he has to put on his knees or his backside?

This feels like a missed opportunity for some fun comic designs.

trail.content_raw:
If Peter Parker is so poor that he has just a few suits that he has to be constantly mending, does that mean he has a patchwork suit(s)?

Does he have a suit that’s just mismatched patches? Does he get fancy with his patches, like sashiko embroidery techniques in the shape of a web or spider for funsies? Does he have a suit that’s Frankensteined from previously wretched suits so all of the web designs are either a hot mess or looks sick as hell? Does he have a suit with scrap patches that Aunt May let him use, like some scrap fabric with novelty print designs he has to put on his knees or his backside?

This feels like a missed opportunity for some fun comic designs.
trail.content:
If Peter Parker is so poor that he has just a few suits that he has to be constantly mending, does that mean he has a patchwork suit(s)?

Does he have a suit that’s just mismatched patches? Does he get fancy with his patches, like sashiko embroidery techniques in the shape of a web or spider for funsies? Does he have a suit that’s Frankensteined from previously wretched suits so all of the web designs are either a hot mess or looks sick as hell? Does he have a suit with scrap patches that Aunt May let him use, like some scrap fabric with novelty print designs he has to put on his knees or his backside?

This feels like a missed opportunity for some fun comic designs.
